captions.text:
Planning,production 
SBS Contents hub

What are we going to 
do on our 100th day anniversary?

-100th day
-Yes

Let's do everything that
you wanted to do in advance
In advance?
Yes, in advance

In a month, let's to
all of them

My love from the stars, Part.7
Sung si kyung-Every moment of you

At that moment when
I finally noticed at you
Everything was changing for sure

My life divides into two,
Before and after knowing you

When you breath warm
Wind blows by

When you smile,
The sun shines

Because you’ve been there
And that is you

Because you leaned
On my shoulders sometimes

So I’m very happy
Because of it
With you time flows and stops
I stare at you

Because I can’t do 
Anything other than that

I want every moment
Of you to be me

Just thinking about it
Makes my heart full of you

-Dominjun
-Why?

Help me to forget
you well

But how do I 
foget you?

Because you’ve been there
And that is you

Thank you so much for being
In my arms from time to time
With you time flows and stops
I stare at you

For me looking at 
you is love

I want every moment
Of you to be me

Just thinking about it
Makes my heart full of you

I want every moment
Of you to be me
I won't go

I'm not leaving without you
I'll stay here

My love from the stars, Part.7
Sung si kyung-Every moment of you

comments.text:
I fell head over heels for this drama... and it ruins every Kdrama for me. 
I couldn't watch a single show nowadays without comparing to this show... 
Nothing compares. It's been 14 months since it last aired (Feb 28 2014- 
April 28 2015) and yet I'm still here watching this MV and cry my eyes out. 
Beautiful story﻿

comments.text:
This song means a lot to me. It's the couple song for my boyfriend and me. 
He is Korean and I am Canadian. We met in Canada when he came here to learn 
English. We watched this drama together when it first aired. We fell in 
love and spent the most amazing year together before he had to go back to 
Korea. Now our relationship is long distance. He left in August 2014 and I 
won't see him again until June 2015. This drama is so special to us, 
speaking of a bond that will cross worlds and a love that will wait 
lifetimes. I feel like we understand how this feels. This song is sung 
beautifully and the lyrics speak the words that come from a beautiful 
heart. To everyone involved in this drama and this song, even though you 
will probably never read this, thank you for this gift.﻿

comments.text:
I like the part where both of them surrender their individual  "dignity" 
completely to the truth of their feeling toward each other. Especially of 
course the male figure, since he was the one who insists that earthlings 
are silly bunch and that particular girl, is the worse of all. And every 
episodes showing that his theories and resolutions about relationship is so 
not the reality of his own life, and he has to throw away his pride layer 
by layer till the  last part, where both find peaceful way and acceptance 
of their no-so-perfect choice of life. But the way the movie lay it down is 
totally awesome, since many movies are just silly in showing 
affection-theme film. Actually this is the first tv series, even movie, 
that I found fit for showing what affection  is all about. Congrats to all 
the MLFTS crews for making this memorable production, Hopefully not the 
masterpiece, coz I hope lots more coming in the future. 
I definitely am going to Korea this year, maybe this coming March, 
Hopefully  I can spend a night  or two doing Ice fishing ﻿

comments.text:
I watched the Heir in less than 1 hour. Standard plot: poor girl and rich 
guy. Every time you are in trouble, the man just appears to help you. For 
MLFTS, Chun Song Yi is the strong and independent girl. Though Do Min Joon 
was her hero at first, later at the end, she was the one who made the 
wedding, flirt him and waited for him. She stands in love, not falls in 
love. They stand for each other.
